Reviews.Title: Quite satisfied
Reviews.Author: Martín DElia
Reviews.Content: The package came with everything it said. Nevertheless, I think the quality of some of the items was pretty disappointing, for instance the two additional lenses, which are completely useless, and the bag, that's not good either. Everyhitng else is great!

ProductInfo.Features:
Brand New w/All Supplied Accessories
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ 18-55mm IS II Lens Package 3
